Sasha Chettri Airtel 4G girl Wiki | Salary | Biography | Height | Photo

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Sasha Chettri is a young girl who is famous in Airtel 4G ads and first appeared in the movie Katti Batti for a very small sequence. She is originally from Dehradun. She worked as a copywriter in the earlier stage of her carrier.

Later in the year 2015 and 2016, she became the famous and well-known face as an Airtel 4G girl. According to some Surveys, Airtel 4G was the most hated brand because of the annoying ads. Sasha loves music and she wants to launch her music album. Initially, Sasha did not want the Airtel ad because for that she was asked to cut her long beautiful hair. She initially refused but later agreed to do the ad.

Biography & Wiki

Sasha Chettri’s Nickname is Ricksha Rani. She was born on born on 26 November 1996 in Dehradun, Uttarakhand, India into a Hindu family. Hence, her current age is 23 years. Sasha’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Education and School, College

Sasha Chettri completed her graduation in Degree in Advertising from Xavier’s Institute of Communications, Mumbai.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Sasha is currently dating music director and singer, Sachin Gupta, with whom she is working on a music album.

Sasha Chettri filmography

Sasha has appeared in the Airtel 4G ads and apart from that, she has also appeared in the movie Katti Batti. She has also appeared in the Sunfeast biscuits ad.

Sasha Chettri is the model-turned-overnight sensation and every Indian who watches television knows her by face. She is dating famous music director and singer, Sachin Gupta who has movies like Finding Fanny, Mere Dad Ki Maruti and Table Number 21. Sasha is a musician and is working on a music album with Sachin Gupta. The two were even spotted together at an event recently. They have already declared themself as a couple in front of people.

Sources say that the filmmaker’s director Saikiran Adivi has finalized Sasha Chettri as the lead actress for the breezy entertainer. After the success of Kerintha, director Saikiran Adivi is planning another youthful entertainer. Since Sasha is popular nationally as an Airtel 4G girl, the director thought she would be a preferable choice. This will be Sasha’s first Telugu film.

Salary and Net Worth

Airtel offered her Around ₹10 Lakhs for the first ads but later on, her price per ad got hicked up to ₹18 Lakhs for Quick heal ads. Sasha Chettri’s net worth is 12 crore and she has a 3 BHK apartment in Mumbai. She also has a BMW Car.

Facts about Sasha Chettri

  • She became famous after she appeared continuously in Airtel 4G advertisements.
  • She initially didn’t want to audition for this ad as she had to cut her long hairs for it.
  • According to a survey, Airtel was the most hated brand in 2015, due to her irritating 4G ads.
  • Before getting the Airtel 4G ad, she used to work as a copywriter.
  • She was seen in a small role of a musician in the film Katti Batti.
  • Her dream is to launch her music album.
